title: BRIEF-Kordamentha Appointed Voluntary Administrators For Ark Mines
text:
BRIEF-Kordamentha Appointed Voluntary Administrators For Ark Mines

Stock Markets 16 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 16:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Kordamentha Appointed Voluntary Administrators For Ark Mines Sept 25 (Reuters) - Kordamentha: * KORDAMENTHA SAYS APPOINTED VOLUNTARY ADMINISTRATORS FOR ARK MINES ON SEPT 25 * ALSO COMMENCED DISCUSSIONS WITH CHAN INVESTMENTS LTD REGARDING ITS OBJECTIVES UNDER A POTENTIAL RESTRUCTURE OR RECAPITALISATION PROPOSAL

BRIEF-Kordamentha Appointed Voluntary Administrators For Ark Mines
